name: rolltable-from-sidebar
description: This module allows rolling random tables conveniently from the sidebar, compendium folders or when right clicking a table link in a Journal.

scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp ./rolltable.js dist/ && cp ./rolltable.css dist/ && cp -r ./lang dist/ && cp ./README.md dist/ && cp ./CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cp ./LICENSE.md dist/ && cp ./module.json dist/ && cp ./THANKS.txt dist/
scripts.copyWin: mkdir dist && copy module.json dist && copy rolltable.js dist && copy rolltable.css dist && xcopy /Y /I lang dist\lang && copy README.md dist && copy CHANGELOG.md dist && copy LICENSE.md dist && copy module.json dist && copy THANKS.txt dist

author: JeansenVaars (Saif Ellafi)
